title: trptam tudittu
sahitya:
trptam tudittu perumidam uru manamE tirupparam kunram tigazhginra murugan


anupallavi

  pirappidan pinnE varum irappim piragu maru pirappEyillA perum pEru pera nI


caraNam    varuttamUTTi unnai vATTum vEdanaiyai turatti OTTum avan tirunAma dhyAnam 
karuttaik-kUTTi nilai nirutti nidam adanai shraddhaiyODu sheidu sirippODuyya nI
